Description.Name: Koe No Ryu
Description.Details: Travel advisory: Sertar - Darr's Disease outbreak warning We have an urgent message regarding travel to and from the planet [[DM.SystemDefs[starsystemdef_Sertar],Sertar]]. The outbreak of Darr's Disease demands our utmost attention, leading the Draconis Combine authorities to impose a temporary quarantine on the entire planet. Stay informed and stay vigilant. Keep a close eye on official announcements regarding the disease situation. Stay updated on travel advisories and guidelines issued by local health authorities regarding Sertar.

Description.Name: Koe No Ryu
Description.Details: Let's prioritize the safety of ourselves and others by adhering to recommended protocols and making responsible choices. Together, we can navigate through this challenging time and protect our beloved community from further harm. Unite in our commitment to health and safety. Through informed actions and unwavering resolve, we shall overcome this adversity as we have overcome many before. Stand tall, for our strength lies not only in our aspirations but also in our collective responsibility. Let us forge ahead, with patriotism as our compass, in the pursuit of a bright future for the Draconis Combine. This message has been approved as proper by the Voice of the Dragon
